extension_desc.message: Adds a toggleable sidebar with all your bookmarks on the left side of your screen.

sidebar_search_no_results.message: No bookmarks matching your search value

share_userdata_desc.message: To improve this extension I need to know better about how you use the sidebar.

share_userdata_desc2.message: If you agree to share your settings anonymously you can help me alot :)

share_userdata_notice.message: Information about your bookmarks [u]will not[/u] be transfered.

overlay_delete_bookmark_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this bookmark?

overlay_delete_dir_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this directory? All subordinate bookmarks will be removed too.

howto_headline.message: Thank you for installing this extension.

howto_tutorial_text_1.message: On any website, just move your cursor to the {1} side of your window

howto_tutorial_text_2.message: {1} click with your mouse to open the sidebar

howto_tutorial_text_3.message: Now you can access all your bookmarks and enjoy this extension :)

changelog_headline.message: Your Bookmark Sidebar has been updated.

settings_px_tolerance_desc.message: Amount of pixels from the left side of every page, in which a mouse click will cause the sidebar to open. You can choose different values for maximized and windowed browser frame.

settings_open_action_desc.message: Open the sidebar by left or right clicking or mouseover on the side of the browser window.

settings_remember_scroll_desc.message: If selected, the scroll position of the bookmark list will be remembered.

settings_remember_search_desc.message: If selected, the entered search value will be remembered across page changes.

settings_hide_empty_dirs_desc.message: If selected, every directory without elements in it will not be shown in the sidebar.

settings_new_tab_desc.message: Open bookmarks in new tab in the foreground or the background

settings_close_timeout_desc.message: Timeout in seconds after the sidebar will be closed. It will count as soon the mouse leaves the sidebar and stops when hovering it again.

settings_scroll_sensitivity_desc.message: Adjust the scroll sensitivity for mouse and trackpad scrolling.

settings_color_scheme_desc.message: The color of the overlay header, the bookmark amount, etc.

settings_feedback_desc.message: You have suggestions for improvements, questions, missing some configuration options or found a bug? To improve the experience with the extension I am very glad for every feedback you give me.

settings_help_desc.message: Do you have problems using the extension?

settings_help_desc2.message: You encountered a problem or the extension does not work? You can send me a message so I can have a look at it.

settings_saved_share_userdata.message: Your preference has been saved successfully
